= Comet program =

This webpage is designed for testing Comet program. To run the Comet program, four files, including Comet source code, parameter file, human database, and a sample raw file, can be downloaded below:

Comet program can be downloaded [http://sourceforge.net/projects/comet-ms/files/comet_source.2014010.zip/download here]

The parameter used for testing can be downloaded [https://code.google.com/p/jumpsearch/source/browse/wiki/comet.params?spec=svn34&r=34 here]

Human database can be downloaded [ftp://ftp.stjude.org/pub/software/jump/Human_20140709.fasta here] 

A testing raw file with mzXML can be downloaded [ftp://ftp.stjude.org/pub/software/jump/mm_15000.mzXML here] 

= Command used =

./comet.exe -Pcomet.params mm_15000.mzXML

= Testing result =

All PSMs were sorted by E-value after searching. We detected 4805 and 6421 at 1% and 10% FDR, respectively.  

= Linux System =
The program was run on Linux CentOS 6.5 operating system.
